actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to require that Federal agencies charge a fee for parking at facilities owned or controlled by the United States, and to ban construction or acquisition of parking facilities by Federal agencies, under certain circumstances.

summary.text: Requires Federal agencies to charge a fee for parking at facilities owned or controlled by the United States, with specified exceptions. Directs the Secretary of Transportation to determine the fees to be charged. Prohibits Federal agencies from constructing or acquiring parking facilities, with specified exceptions.

titles.title: A bill to require that Federal agencies charge a fee for parking at facilities owned or controlled by the United States, and to ban construction or acquisition of parking facilities by Federal agencies, under certain circumstances.
